
    dependent_one = TheoryDependent.new(
    	StringToTheory.run("if(var1.realise2(var2[var3][:params]).params[var3].value.length == var2[var3][:output])\nreturn true\nend")
		)
    action_one = TheoryAction.new(
    	TheoryStatement.new(StringToTheory.run('Statement.new(Return.new,var1.params[var3])')),
    	StringToTheory.run('var1.statement_id')
		)
    result_one = TheoryResult.new(StringToTheory.run("if(var1.pass?(var2[var3]))\nreturn true\nend"))    
    Theory.new([dependent_one],action_one,[result_one])
